item.title:
Writers deserve to be compensated fairly for their work.
We wholeheartedly stand with the WGA in their pursuit for fair contracts and reasonable pay.
There would be no films without writers.
https://wgacontract2023.org/announcements/wga-on-strike…
#WGAStrong

item.title: Arian Moayed has been nominated for Best Performance by an Actor in a Featured Role in a Play for ‘A DOLL’S HOUSE’ at the Tony Awards.
